description:
Cozy apartment in Upper West side, fits 3 people comfortably. NO NEED TO SHARE, the entire apartment is rented. Less than 10 min walk to subway and bus stations, various supermarkets, nice restaurants and bars and parks. Includes TV, WiFi, personal care amenities, and kitchen supplies. 
I'm a Columbia University Grad student and speak Spanish and French.

The privacy and comfort that you need for a low price!

Full access

Available on the phone, email or chat.

Very close to subway lines and bus stations.
name: Cozy appartment in Upper West Side
review: Camila was incredibly response.  The apartment was perfect for my week long visit attending a program at Columbia U.
